name: Esc:RNG
description:
A group of gacha game players ended up stuck in a game universe made by egoistic, incompetent, magic-wielding developers. The players have to find their way out to return to their normal world by fighting enemies in the buggy game.

Features:

Use the gacha machine to get a variety of weapons and artefacts 

Switch between two characters with their own skills

Level changes every time you enter

Fight a variety of enemies!
